message:
If you are interested in mobile games. there will be private beta testing for "Athorus" this month. 

"Athorus" is a mid-core top down shoot-em up mobile game, that’s designed on a pharaonic theme and story. The main character is “Athorus”, a pharaonic magician king who is revived to fight his antagonist and to defend his people.

Your feed-backs are welcomed.
http://spyros-games.com/athorus
story: Mostafa Hussein shared Spyros Entertainment's post to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Spyros Entertainment
description:
We will be opening private beta testing for "Athorus" this month.

"Athorus" is a mid-core top down shoot-em up mobile game, that’s designed on a pharaonic theme and story. The main character is “Athorus”, a pharaonic magician king who is revived to fight his antagonist and to defend his people.

If you are interested in playing Athorus, just let us know here : http://spyros-games.com/athorus

Your feedbacks are welcomed!

data.message: Ali Salem Korayem check this out :D do you remember ?

موقع الشركة بتاعتكم مش تمام ... تقدروا تستخدموا السكربت دا 

http://khashabawy.com/company_script

و انا ممكن أقدمهولكم مجاناً تقديراً على عملكم الرائع
A two weeks ago I was talking with a few friends about game dev in Egypt, and we were wondering what happened to the latest game Spyros was making, I'm very happy that it wasn't forgotten :)
